sentences.en: According to the existing situation of the western enterprises, imitative innovation is a practical choice.
sentences.cn: 从西部企业存在的实际状况看, 模仿创新是一种比较现实的选择.
表演是一种模仿性艺术.

sentences.en: An imitative full - stress design method was presented for structural optimum design with discrete variables.
sentences.cn: 本文以满应力设计思想为基础,提出了适用于离散变量结构优化设计计算的拟满应力设计方法.

sentences.en: And with these toys, their play tends to be more imitative than imaginative.
sentences.cn: 有了这些玩具以后, 他们游戏时趋向模仿电视节目多于想像.

sentences.en: At the same time, the curiosity of young people and strong imitative.
sentences.cn: 同时青少年好奇心及模仿性强.

sentences.en: Babies of eight to twelve months are generally highly imitative.
sentences.cn: 8到12个月大的婴儿通常很爱模仿。

sentences.en: Eye Angel can product imitative biological electric current and massage vibration.
sentences.cn: 眼天使产品可以模仿生物电流和振动按摩.

sentences.en: He writes in a very individual way, ie an original way, not derived or imitative.
sentences.cn: 他的写作方法别具一格(有独创方式, 不沿袭或模仿他人).
人类是一种模仿性动物.
鼓励模仿性犯罪的电影

sentences.en: Onomatopoeic words are imitative of noises.
sentences.cn: 拟声词是用来模仿声音的.

sentences.en: Sculpture is an imitative art, ie it copies people, things, etc from real life.
sentences.cn: 雕刻是模仿的艺术(模刻真实生活中的人 、 物等).

sentences.en: The identification of the imitative or genuine the laser carve seal andthe new problem for people.
sentences.cn: 激光雕刻印章印文真伪鉴定成为文检员面临的新课题.

sentences.en: This research has considered imitative innovation as a strategy suitable for startup companies.
sentences.cn: 本文认为模仿性创新是一种适用于初创公司的战略.

sentences.en: With these toys, their play tends to be more imitative than imaginative.
sentences.cn: 有了这些玩具, 他们游戏时就更倾向于模仿而不是想象.

sentences.en: Young people might be provoked into imitative crime by the exploits they see on TV.
sentences.cn: 年轻人可能会从电视上看到的“英勇行为”中受到启发而仿效电视主人公实施犯罪。

trans.tran_en: copying someone or something, especially in a way that shows you do not have any ideas of your own
